text:
Antioxidants Obese women have a higher likelihood of 
selenium deficiency and marginal vitamin C 
status*
The odds of low vitamin E, α- and 
β-carotene, and other carotenoids are greater 
among obese women*
BMI does not appear to be associated  
with mid-trimester ascorbic acid or retinol 
concentrations 
Ascorbic acid concentrations are significantly 
lower in women who subsequently deliver 
small-for-gestational-age infants, compared 
with those who deliver appropriate-for-
gestational-age inf
